label: logicC:manufacturing_en
steps: [1] If an incoming material batch passes quality inspection, then it is accepted into inventory.
[2] If a batch is accepted into inventory, then it can be issued to the machining line.
[3] If a batch has been issued to machining and the CNC machine is calibrated, then the production run can begin.
[5] The incoming material batch passes quality inspection.
[6] For any operator x, if x has completed certification training, then x is authorized to run production equipment.
[7] Operator a has completed certification training.
[8] For any operator x, if x is authorized to run production equipment, then x is assigned either to the CNC mill or to the assembly station.
[9] Therefore, the batch is accepted into inventory (from [1] and [5]).
[10] Therefore, the batch is issued to the machining line (from [2] and [9]).
[11] Therefore, the production run can begin (from [3], [10], and [4]).
[12] Therefore, operator a is authorized to run production equipment and is assigned either to the CNC mill or to the assembly station (from [6], [7], [8]).
